UTM Participated in 4th FIG Young Surveyors Asia Pacific Meeting
================================================================

by [norainismail](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/norainismail/ "Posts by norainismail")
 | Jan 3, 2024 | [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/01/IMG_9391-980x552.jpg)

Seoul, 8 – 10 November 2023 – Two researchers from the Faculty of Built Environment and Surveying (FABU) at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (UTM) recently took part in an international conference organized by the International Federation of Surveyors (FIG) – Young Surveyors Asia & the Pacific Network. The 4th Young Surveyors Asia & the Pacific Meeting (#4YSAPM) was held this year, in conjunction with Smart Geo Expo 2023 (SGE2023), with the theme “Geo-Revolution, Better Life for All”. The event took place from November 8th to November 10th, 2023, at the Korea International Exhibition Centre (KINTEX) in Goyang-si, South Korea.

For further readings, kindly visit [https://news.utm.my/2023/12/utm-participated-in-4th-fig-young-surveyors-asia-pacific-meeting/?fbclid=IwAR2MHRPYsyA5BBgo9Md8u8ti8g4YrNzyvatRe2EXs6UN8GwrRJu8xabljE0](https://news.utm.my/2023/12/utm-participated-in-4th-fig-young-surveyors-asia-pacific-meeting/?fbclid=IwAR2MHRPYsyA5BBgo9Md8u8ti8g4YrNzyvatRe2EXs6UN8GwrRJu8xabljE0)
